translation-info.title: 個のA、始まりのZ-prologue-
translation-info.description: The short introduction to the album Hakkin no Yoake

line.hiragana: ねむって|おきたら|また|はじめよう
line.kanji: 眠って|起きたら|また|始めよう
line.english: go to sleep, when you wake up, it will all begin once again
line.literal: go to sleep|when you wake up|again|begin
line.explained: go to sleep|when you wake up|again, repeated action|to begin
line.builder: *go to sleep*|go to sleep, *when you wake up*|go to sleep, when you wake up, ___ *once again*|go to sleep, when you wake up, *it will all begin* once again

line.romaji: yume no naka de mada zzz
line.english: you're still sleeping within your dreams
line.explained: dream|points to dream|inside|points to inside the dream|still|zzz (sleep, innit)
line.builder: *dreams*|dreams|*inside* your deams|inside your dreams|you're *still* ___ inside your dreams|you're still *sleeping* inside your dreams

line.hiragana: あんまり|のんびりしていられない
line.kanji: あんまり|のんびりしていられない
line.english: I can't keep being care free
line.explained: remaining|nonbiri = care free, nonbirishite = to be care free (shite is like adding 'to do' to an onomatopoeic word), irarenai makes the phrase nagative

line.english: I want to go now, but I'm fast asleep
line.explained: quickly|want to go (iku = to go, tai = want to)|but|zzz
line.builder: *now*|*I want to go* now|I want to go now, *but*|I want to go now, but *I'm fast asleep*

line.hiragana: たくさん|けいかく|が|あるんだ
line.kanji: たくさん|計画|が|あるんだ
line.english: Even though I've got a load of plans
line.explained: lots|plan|points to lots of plans|have = aru, nda adds 'even though' to I have to make 'even though I have'
line.builder: *lots of*|lots of *plans*|lots of plans|*even though I've got* lots of plans

line.explained: waiting impatiently|adds emphasis to the phrase

line.romaji: azukatta mama no ai wo kaesou
line.hiragana: あずかった|まま|の|あい|を|かえそう
line.kanji: あずかった|まま|の|愛|を|かえそう
line.english: I should return this love that I've recieved
line.explained: recieve|state/condition|points to the |love|points to the love that was recieved|return
line.builder: *recieved*|*this ___ I've* recieved|this *___* I've recieved|this *love* I've recieved|this love I've recieved|*I should return* this love I've recieved

line.romaji: natsukashii basho ni tatou kimi no moto e
line.hiragana: なつかしい|ばしょ|に|たとう|きみ|の|もと|へ
line.kanji: 懐かしい|場所|に|立とう|きみ|の|もと|へ
line.english: To where you stand, in a familiar place
line.explained: nostalgic|place|points to nostalgic place|stand|you|points to you|location|points to your location
line.builder: *familiar*|familiar *place*|*in a* familiar place|*stand* in a familiar place|*you* stand in a familiar place|you stand in a familiar place|*where* you stand, in a familiar place|*To* where you stand, in a familiar place

line.hiragana: であおう|あたらしい|じぶん|を|みせよう
line.kanji: 出逢おう|あたらしい|自分|を| みせよう
line.english: When we meet again, I'll show you my new self
line.explained: presumptive form of to meet|new|self|points to new self|show
line.builder: *When we meet again*|when we meet again, *new*|when we meet again, new *self*| when we meet again. *I'll show you my* new self
